001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.config;
002
003/**
004 * Defines the contract for database types.
005 *
006 * <p>This interface provides methods for retrieving database driver information,
007 * connection protocol, and an enumeration representing the database type.
008 * Implementing enums define specific database types (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL).
009 *
010 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate ğŸ’ğŸ‘¨ğŸ’»
011 */
012public interface DbType<T extends Enum<T>> {
013
014   /**
015    * Retrieves the driver associated with the database type.
016    *
017    * @return The {@link java.sql.Driver} instance.
018    */
019   java.sql.Driver driver();
020
021   /**
022    * Retrieves the connection protocol for the database type.
023    *
024    * @return The database connection protocol as a string.
025    */
026   String protocol();
027
028   /**
029    * Retrieves the enum implementation representing this database type.
030    *
031    * @return An enumeration representing the database type.
032    */
033   T enumImpl();
034}
